long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A homepage extension that will give your homepage a Nordic feel with minimal elements on your screen. If you like Norse Mythology or Vikings and would like to see it on your homepage every time you open a new tab, this is for you.
